name: berry
description: >***Crimson's package manager.*** ## What does Berry do? Berry is a web server which can install and dispense Crimson source code files. Instances of Berry can join a Berry 'Bush' to share source files from peer-to-peer in order to help teams collaborate. ## How can I use Berry? Berry is packaged with the Crimson compiler, and will be run automatically to manage dependencies for the compilation process. Berry can also be run alone.
